description: Try our easy to follow Stonefruit with Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Stonefruit with Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 nectarines, halved, stones removed (peaches or apricots)
2 tbs slivered almonds, toasted (to serve  see tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Combine sugar and cinnamon on a plate and dip fruit, cutside down, into sugar to coat. Place in a single layer, cut-side up, on grill tray. Grill for 5 minutes or until sugar caramelises and fruit is warm.
Transfer fruit to bowls. Top with yoghurt, honey, almonds and mint. Serve.
